data.author: Kurt Lawrence

changelog.release_notes:
2015.10.17
PEBBLE WATCH: v2.0 - Build 4
	- Pebble Round release version, initial release to get app onto round watches.

PEBBLE WATCH: v1.2 - Build 3
	- Added a new version screen.
	- Added a track that stops the watch pushing an update if an incoming message from the phone is dropped.
	- Fixed a bug where an item would have a black background when phone data was sent to watch

ANDROID APP: v2.0 - Build 2
	- Keyboard enter button now adds the item rather than inserting new line.
	- Added a new version screen.
	- Added clear all and uncheck all buttons to assist in list management.
	- Added a connection information message bar that will assist in determining when and what changes are occurring between the two devices over bluetooth.
	- Stopped timer services stacking, this will fix unusually short update times, and probable crashes.
	- Setup persistent storage to occur immediately following any changes, hopefully this will fix any saving issues upon app exit.
- Fixed a small bug where the watch would not parse strings properly if data is added straight from phone

data.description: A useful checklist app that will move checked items out of the way when checked. The app is designed for shopping or todo applications, position unchecked items at the top of the stack for ease of use. The app requires an Android companion app to add and remove items. Test the functionality without the companion app. Thanks for supporting a single developer.
